articles.title: R21/Matrix-M Malaria Vaccine Awarded WHO ‘Stamp of Approval’ - European Pharmaceutical Manufacturer
articles.description: The R21/Matrix-M malaria vaccine developed by the University of Oxford and the Serum Institute of India, leveraging Novavax’s adjuvant technology, has been awarded prequalification status by the World Health Organization.
